messages: 5c48596b0d497f5f93c1dd68d9906d5d (06:14): how can I get vim to "compile" my java code with javac by typing :make ?
4f121933e01ce1faf5dbbc2de44e632a (06:17): there should be javac I guess

a004ca5550d10c05716d250c1e1389a8 (06:19): ekim\: (seen [<channel>] <nick>) -- Returns the last time <nick> was seen and what <nick> was last seen saying. <channel> is only necessary if the message isn't sent on the channel itself.
5c48596b0d497f5f93c1dd68d9906d5d (06:19): I did ":set compiler javac", but now I get this:
5c48596b0d497f5f93c1dd68d9906d5d (06:20): and then it just gives me the proper usage for javac
4f121933e01ce1faf5dbbc2de44e632a (06:23): it's broken then, maybe take a look at that compiler plugin and read :he 'mp as mauke suggested
5c48596b0d497f5f93c1dd68d9906d5d (06:24): i tried, but vim's help files are too confusing for me
f9fd1ec837bc12464dfb2b873991fa4e (06:26): Does anyone know where I can get the official vim help.txt file
f9fd1ec837bc12464dfb2b873991fa4e (06:26): It didnt come with mine :(
f9fd1ec837bc12464dfb2b873991fa4e (06:26): also is there a script to insert the "Made with vim" logo ?
8bece2647a39db763401c1e98abe5854 (06:35): ekim\: you've asked some very poor questions, please improve your question asking.
f9fd1ec837bc12464dfb2b873991fa4e (06:36): ok Let me ask again ...better
8bece2647a39db763401c1e98abe5854 (06:36): ekim\: you've siad, "it didn't come with mine", but you didn't give us the url you used to download your vim.
8bece2647a39db763401c1e98abe5854 (06:36): ekim\: also, the script to insert, "Made with vim", what format are you after? ascii art? png? svg? insert into what? html? plain text?
f9fd1ec837bc12464dfb2b873991fa4e (06:36): The text files that are called when you type :help
f9fd1ec837bc12464dfb2b873991fa4e (06:37): alright I downloaded Gvim version 7.0 from the official site gvim.sf.net
f9fd1ec837bc12464dfb2b873991fa4e (06:37): when I type :help the help fiels are missing
f9fd1ec837bc12464dfb2b873991fa4e (06:37): Where can I download ALL of the helpfiles in .txt format
f9fd1ec837bc12464dfb2b873991fa4e (06:37): Also I am on windows
f9fd1ec837bc12464dfb2b873991fa4e (06:38): how whas that for question asking ?
8bece2647a39db763401c1e98abe5854 (06:38): it sounds like you downloaded vim without the vim runtime files.
8bece2647a39db763401c1e98abe5854 (06:38): where did you get vim from?
f9fd1ec837bc12464dfb2b873991fa4e (06:38): the official vim site vim.sfnet
f9fd1ec837bc12464dfb2b873991fa4e (06:39): Can I not just download the help files ?
8bece2647a39db763401c1e98abe5854 (06:40): I think you need to download the vim runtime files.
f9fd1ec837bc12464dfb2b873991fa4e (06:41): it is the OFFICIAL UNOFICIAL vi
f9fd1ec837bc12464dfb2b873991fa4e (06:42): I downloaded a few syntax plugins
8bece2647a39db763401c1e98abe5854 (06:42): or, you can download the complete self installer which is here: ftp://ftp.vim.org/pub/vim/pc/gvim70.exe
f9fd1ec837bc12464dfb2b873991fa4e (06:43): How do I use them
f9fd1ec837bc12464dfb2b873991fa4e (06:43): I put them in my syntax folder
8bece2647a39db763401c1e98abe5854 (06:43): ekim\: the filetype detection should pick them up.
8bece2647a39db763401c1e98abe5854 (06:43): install the vim runtime files first
f9fd1ec837bc12464dfb2b873991fa4e (06:44): ...yes but im creating files from scratch
f9fd1ec837bc12464dfb2b873991fa4e (06:44): Btw thats for that installer
f9fd1ec837bc12464dfb2b873991fa4e (06:46): I had nothign on my other one
f9fd1ec837bc12464dfb2b873991fa4e (06:46): This has all buttons and crap
f9fd1ec837bc12464dfb2b873991fa4e (06:46): How can I run vim in console mode ?

fdbefe9b429bae7b8405be159892dc42 (06:59): I would like to take advantage of the new spellcheck in vim7, but I don't like having to type such a long command every time I want to use it, but putting it in my .vimrc causes my C code to get highlighted like crazy.  Is there a way to bind a :command to a keystroke in command mode or something?
fdbefe9b429bae7b8405be159892dc42 (07:00): ...and that had the eloquence of a drunken fool.  I really ought to sleep more, or at least read before I hit enter...
96350377aac62e430e8794dc77c871f7 (07:01): rcbarnes: create a map for it
96350377aac62e430e8794dc77c871f7 (07:02): then you can toggle it on and off to your liking
